---
title: "Ciclos termodinámicos con librerías de python"
format: 
  html:
    fig-width: 8
    fig-height: 6
  pdf:
    fig-width: 7
    fig-height: 5
---

::: {.cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

r = np.arange(0, 2, 0.01)
theta = 2 * np.pi * r
fig, ax = plt.subplots(subplot_kw={'projection': 'polar'})
ax.plot(theta, r)
ax.set_rticks([0.5, 1, 1.5, 2])
ax.grid(True)
plt.show()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display}
